ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 209
ygData.msgSnippet: And to add to this..  each skill has a certain maximum at each level, therefore your trainer tells you i can not train you at this time or whatever it says,
ygData.messageBody:
And to add to this.. each skill has a certain maximum
at each level, therefore your trainer tells you "i can
not train you at this time" or whatever it says, which
is saying, you've already maxed this out. Keep that
in mind, and take a look at your points in a skill.
They'll most likely be stuck at an integer of 5,
because they go up 5 per level. Hope this helps..

-Ziele- 48th Rogue *Bristlebane
